text: The surname Mikos may refer to: *Mikos family, Hungarian noble family; see Mikosdpuszta **Gizella Mikos, wife of [Salvador de Iturbide y Marzán *Michael J. Mikos, Polish American professor *Władysław Mikos (1885–1970), Polish painter *Bartosz Mikos (born 1980), Polish Olympic archer ==See also== *Miko (disambiguation)
title: Mikos
